metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3246 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A heap buffer overflow vulnerability in msadpcm_decode_block of libsndfile 1.0.30 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted WAV file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3246` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsndfile1 - 1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.3+esm1
sndfile-programs - 1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.3+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.3+esm1').
